org.apache.flink.api.common.state

接口 StateBackend


  • @PublicEvolving
public interface StateBackend
    The StateBackend is used by StateDescriptor instances to create actual state representations.

    • 方法概要

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      <T,ACC> FoldingState<T,ACC> createFoldingState(FoldingStateDescriptor<T,ACC> stateDesc)
      Creates and returns a new FoldingState.
      <T> ListState<T> createListState(ListStateDescriptor<T> stateDesc)
      Creates and returns a new ListState.
      <T> ReducingState<T> createReducingState(ReducingStateDescriptor<T> stateDesc)
      Creates and returns a new ReducingState.
      <T> ValueState<T> createValueState(ValueStateDescriptor<T> stateDesc)
      Creates and returns a new ValueState.

    • 方法详细资料

      • createValueState

        <T> ValueState<T> createValueState(ValueStateDescriptor<T> stateDesc)
                            throws Exception
        Creates and returns a new ValueState.
        类型参数:
        T - The type of the value that the ValueState can store.
        参数:
        stateDesc - The StateDescriptor that contains the name of the state.
        抛出:
        Exception

      • createListState

        <T> ListState<T> createListState(ListStateDescriptor<T> stateDesc)
                          throws Exception
        Creates and returns a new ListState.
        类型参数:
        T - The type of the values that the ListState can store.
        参数:
        stateDesc - The StateDescriptor that contains the name of the state.
        抛出:
        Exception

      • createReducingState

        <T> ReducingState<T> createReducingState(ReducingStateDescriptor<T> stateDesc)
                                  throws Exception
        Creates and returns a new ReducingState.
        类型参数:
        T - The type of the values that the ListState can store.
        参数:
        stateDesc - The StateDescriptor that contains the name of the state.
        抛出:
        Exception

      • createFoldingState

        <T,ACC> FoldingState<T,ACC> createFoldingState(FoldingStateDescriptor<T,ACC> stateDesc)
                                        throws Exception
        Creates and returns a new FoldingState.
        类型参数:
        T - Type of the values folded into the state
        ACC - Type of the value in the state
        参数:
        stateDesc - The StateDescriptor that contains the name of the state.
        抛出:
        Exception
